backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, admin token auth, and CRUD state for profiles, CMS sections, products, gallery, messages, contact info, and site settings.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten oneâ€‘sentence summaries for various frontend files describing behavior and responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes with base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with sidebar navigation, logout handling, and an Outlet for nested admin pages.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Renders an admin login form with username/password inputs, error handling, and session-based login logic.
frontend/src/admin/AdminRoutes.tsx: Controls admin routing by checking token validity, initializing the actor, handling backend errors, and showing login or layout.
frontend/src/admin/components/Initialize: Displays a card that lets admins initialize sample site content through a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Implements login and logout mutations for admin authentication, handling token extraction and error translation.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing the admin token and session errors in sessionStorage.
Shows admin dashboard stats for sections, products, gallery items, and messages, with loading and quick actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminNotFound.t: Displays a 404-style page for missing admin routes with a link back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactInfoEdit: Placeholder page for editing site contact information.
frontend/src/admin/pages/GalleryEditor.t: Placeholder page for managing gallery images.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MessagesInbox.t: Placeholder page for viewing and managing user contact messages.
Static admin page showing a placeholder for future product management.
Static admin page showing a placeholder for editing website content sections.
frontend/src/admin/pages/SiteSettingsEdi: Form-driven admin page to load and save site name and logo settings with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/admin/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Provides a modal for entering and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/admin/utils/adminAuthErrorM: Defines admin auth error messages and utilities to map replica rejection details to user-friendly text and decide token preservation.
frontend/src/admin/utils/option.ts: Utility to extract a string token from various Motoko optional return formats.
frontend/src/admin/utils/replicaRejectio: Parses errors to extract replica rejection details, detect canister-stopped and connectivity failures.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routes configuration with public and admin areas, error boundaries, layout components, and query client setup.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: UI component displaying retry and diagnostics options when backend connectivity fails.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the site logo using settings with a fallback image and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionLabe: Renders the current build version and optional preview badge.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation and mutation to send messages, showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation links, mobile drawer menu, branding, and optional logout.
frontend/src/components/PublicAppErrorBo: React error boundary that catches UI errors and shows a fallback card with reload and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Provides reusable loading, error, empty, and skeleton UI components for query-driven views.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component that loads contact info and site settings, handles connectivity errors, and displays links and metadata.
frontend/src/components/StartupHealthGat: Gate component that waits for actor initialization and backend health checks, showing loading or error UI before rendering children.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Runs a timed backend health check using the actor and exposes a normalized status and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Clears the Internet Identity session and wipes all cached query data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as sections, products, gallery items, contact info, settings, messages, and user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and color variables for light and dark themes with custom palette definitions.
frontend/src/layout/PublicLayout.tsx: Provides the public site layout with header, footer, and routed main content area.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Loads and displays filtered 'About' sections with loading, connectivity error, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and a contact form, including loading and backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Shows backend connectivity diagnostics, actor initialization status, and tools to retry or reset connection state.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays gallery items with skeleton loading, error fallback, a grid of images, and an image preview dialog.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage, loading site settings and sections with error handling, and displays a hero section with images and feature content.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products with loading, empty, and connectivity error states, rendering product cards with images and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PublicNotFound.tsx: Displays a styled 404 page with navigation options to go home or return to the previous page.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Generates a build version string using environment variables, git commit, or timestamp with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/connectivityDiagnosti: Provides helpers to store, retrieve, and clear the last connectivity error in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/queryTimeout.ts: Implements a timeout wrapper for async queries and utilities to normalize and detect connectivity-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/releaseChannel.ts: Determines whether the app is running in production or preview mode based on environment variables or URL.
frontend/src/utils/routerBasePath.ts: Computes the router base path from environment config or preview URL patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters across query strings, hash routing, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, architectural notes, existing features, and known issues for building a website with an admin CMS. Includes deployment problems, admin login issues, routing errors, and frontend loading failures.
